page.shortlink: api sql namespace table filter clone function
page.description: Create a copy of an object instance
page.discussion: The SQL::TableFilter.Clone() method makes a copy of a SQL::TableFilter object and its properties.
page.example:
dim filter1 as SQL::TableFilter filter1.IncludeAllSchemas = .f. filter1.IncludeAllViews = .t. filter1.MaximumTablesInList = 100
filter2 = filter1.Clone()
